    public class RandomWalkZombie
extends Zombie
    Sets up the random walk zombies and their animation sprites

        public RandomWalkZombie(double speed,
                        double smell,
                        double decision_rate,
                        Location location)
        Takes in all attributes from the Zombie class and keeps a local copy.
        Parameters:
        speed - how fast zombie moves
        smell - how far zombie smells
        decision_rate - every few seconds it changes direction
        location - location of zombie
